info.title: Zapier AI Actions for GPT (Dynamic)
info.description: Equip GPTs with the ability to run thousands of actions via Zapier. (703dcca4c2e24c5ea5e2c717eba11029)

parameters.name: apps

schema.description: Optional comma-separated list of app names to filter the available actions.
schema.title: Apps

parameters.description: Optional comma-separated list of app names to filter the available actions.

get.description:
List all the currently available actions for the user. If you try to run an action and receive an error
that it does not exist, try refreshing this list first.

parameters.name: available_action_id

schema.description: The ID of the action to execute.
schema.title: Available Action Id

parameters.description: The ID of the action to execute.

post.description:
Run an available action. The request body should contain `instructions` and optionally `preview_only`.
All other action-specific parameters must be placed within the `params_hints` object in the request body.

id.description: The unique ID of the available action.
id.title: Id

operation_id.description: The operation ID of the available action.
operation_id.title: Operation Id

params.description: Available hint fields for the action.
params.title: Params

configuration_link.description: Guide the user to setup new actions with the configuration_link. You can optionally add ?setup_action=... onto configuration_link to set up a specific Zapier app and action. For example: https://actions.zapier.com/gpt/start?setup_action=gmail find email
configuration_link.title: Configuration Link

RunResponse.description: This is a summary of the results given the action that was run.

id.description: The id of the run log.
id.title: Id

action_used.description: The name of the action that was run.
action_used.title: Action Used

input_params.description: The params we used / will use to run the action.
input_params.title: Input Params

review_url.description: The URL to run the action or review the AI choices the AI made for input_params given instructions.
review_url.title: Review Url

result.description: A trimmed down result of the first item of the full results. Ideal for humans and language models!
result.title: Result

additional_results.description: The rest of the full results. Always returns an array of objects
additional_results.title: Additional Results

result_field_labels.description: Human readable labels for some of the keys in the result.
result_field_labels.title: Result Field Labels

status.description: The status of the action run.
status.title: Status

error.description: The error message if the action run failed.
error.title: Error

assistant_hint.description: A hint for the assistant on what to do next.
assistant_hint.title: Assistant Hint

full_results.description: The full results, not summarized, if available. Always returns an array of objects.
full_results.title: Full Results

RunResponse.title: RunResponse

RunRequest.description:
Try and stuff as much relevant information into the instructions as possible.
Set any necessary AvailableActionSchema params within the `params_hints` object.

instructions.description: Plain English instructions. Provide as much detail as possible.
instructions.title: Instructions

preview_only.description: If true, return a preview instead of executing the action.
preview_only.title: Preview Only

RunRequest.title: RunRequest
